amendment.description: Amendment increases the EPA State and Tribal Assistance Grants account by $2 million for the National Clean Diesel Initiative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding by $2 million for State and Tribal Assistance Grants.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Taylor (NC) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Taylor (NC).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Taylor (NC) amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
